page.title: 17RECREATION IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: {Southmead: }Youth Club-offers much but is under used as trouble has led to a bad reputation.Children's playground & an adventure area well used.Glencoyne Sq."village green" unused grassy area.The closed Secondary School's running track has uncertain future- would be real loss.Summer Schools well used during holiday. {Horfield: }Sports Centre to open soon. {Henbury & Westbury: }Much gardening, DIY,sport,theatre-going,children's ballet,music lessons, etc.Village Halls,Social Clubs provide venues for dances,church lads, etc. Many amateur football,cricket,bowling clubs.
